imdb.plot outline: Business Casual Live is a series of 6 live comedy shows starring Mark Sipka, Trent Bruce, Andrew Stuart, Tyler Snyder, and Frank Ebels. The group was known for its strange characters, audience involvement, and the use of improvisation in their sketches. Originality was key for Business Casual as they strove to provide audiences with fresh comedy they had never seen before.
imdb.title: Business Casual Live
plot: _Business Casual Live_ (qv) is a series of 6 live comedy shows starring Mark Sipka, Trent Bruce, Andrew Stuart, Tyler Snyder, and Frank Ebels. The group was known for its strange characters, audience involvement, and the use of improvisation in their sketches. Originality was key for Business Casual as they strove to provide audiences with fresh comedy they had never seen before.
